channel.title: Toronto - Weather - Environment Canada
channel.description: Current weather conditions, forecasts and warnings for: Toronto

item.title: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Toronto
item.description: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:30 PM EST Wednesday 06 February 2013

item.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -6.1°C
item.description:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 7:00 PM EST Wednesday 06 February 2013
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

item.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.

item.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
item.description: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 PM EST Wednesday 06 February 2013

item.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
item.description: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 PM EST Wednesday 06 February 2013
